name: SpecNext Invaders (ZX Spectrum Next)
description:
Classic space shooter for the ZX Spectrum Next. I wrote this to learn Z80 assembly language.

Use cursor keys or O P keys and space or Kempston joysticks to play.

Special thanks:

  • CSpect
  • sjasmplus
  • Visual Studio Code
  • DeZog
  • SpecBong
  • Lance A. Leventhal and Winthrop Saville for the amazing "Z80 Assembly Language Subroutines" book
  • Lucky Red Fish
  • Remy's ZX Spectrum Tools
  • Shiru's AYFX Editor and player
  • Z80 Heaven
  • ZX Spectrum Next community for their support

Source code available on GitHub.
